title: (x) the\_light - BD Bardust {Franz}
content:
ciao devo trovare il font da questa immagine ma non riesco a trovarlo mi potete aiutare vi prego ne ho veramente bisogno   
  ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122156im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36759.jpg)
author: residentevil

comments.content: please help me out if you know where i could find this font.

I don't know Italian, but that's [BD Bardust](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122156/http:/www.typedifferent.com/2003/goodies/bd_bardust.jpg), and it's [free](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122156/http:/www.typedifferent.com/2003/index.html)! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122156im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
thanks l'ho trovato nel link che mi hai dato

You're welcome! As for the rest: My Italian hasn't gotten any better, I still don't quite know what you're saying. Sorry. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122156im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
